#summary How to deploy UniMRCP client and LumenVox MRCPv1 or MRCPv2 server.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Id-31

==1. Overview ==
This guide describes how to deploy UniMRCP client and LumenVox server. It provides typical configurations of UniMRCP client and LumenVox server and sample network captures.
<br>
LumenVox is an Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) vendor. LumenVox server supports both MRCPv1 and MRCPv2 and is available for various platforms:
  * Fedora 5 - 8
  * Red Hat Enterprise Linux 4, 5
  * CentOS 4, 5 (through Red Hat builds)
  * Debian 4 (etch)
  * Windows
<br>
Please refer to http://www.lumenvox.com for further information on how to
obtain and install LumenVox MRCP server. 

<br>
==2. Deployment ==
====Topology====
UniMRCP client allows to connect to LumenVox server. Both are on the same LAN.
